segments.text: Could you tell me something about your previous job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I once worked in a small stock exchange . My work is very simple .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I thought it too dull . Also I didn't think it was challenging enough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What made you make a decision to leave ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The stock exchange where I worked was too small My further promotion was impossible . I am able of more responsibilities , so I decided to leave .
segments.speaker: S2
